resume.title: Resume
resume.extract: Highly skilled Systems and Computer Engineer with a proven track record in web development and software engineering. Proficient Front-End developer and Scrum Master Certified with extensive experience in creating robust web applications. Fluent in JavaScript, React, Node.js and Python, Django, with expertise in both frontend and backend technologies. Adept at driving projects to success while adhering to industry best practices. Strong analytical, planning, and communication skills combined with a commitment to teamwork and user-centric design.
